body: Autists really be down here writing novels.
I am now a step closer to godhood

Could all be a fucking trick, demon sword at her most weakened mind state manipulate mc by twisting past events, for all anyone knows it could've been a wicked demon who really, really liked raping virgins and it morphs itself into a sword promising power to those maidens who surrender their bodies to it, during hard times of war against demons, takes full advantage of desperate heroines seeking to do anything and pay everything to save their people only to become a nymphomaniac bitch in heat drained to a husk, killed by the demon sword itself then disposed of, rinse and repeat. But of course, such a thing is trusted with not one, not two, but three royalty women for itself and it can fucking breed with them too. Nobody in that world being any the wiser can figure out that in about 2 - 3 generations (if not sooner) they'll be dealing with not just one demon king, but an army of them in at least three flavors, human, elf and furry. What'll they do then? More virgins for demon swords?

Atleast, the "I turned into a demon sword!" guy didn't get his own body back. All tentacles like friggin squid as in usual jap fashion. That would've been even more convenient "oh, come on! yeah right sure..." jap storytelling where everything works out for the autho- err mc and everybody being perfectly fine with it as long as the mc is happy, the vanillafags and their thirst for "wholesum ending" are happy. (Despite the fact that it's still a demon in a sword who after raping the entire cast, yes, tentacle rape, not very "wholesum" ehh? gets away with it even on "moral" level like an absolute karma houdini simply because the bitch it's connected to got shown some "flashback images" while getting raped into a mindrape trance state where the demon sword could easily manipulate and show her whatever it wanted, for all it could be that the hero lost and his yellow haired waifu got tentacle'd to death, but sure the mc who happens to look like her buys it and shills for the demon.)

Worst ending, usually don't bother with shit like this, but damn, it couldn't be anymore predictable, corney, cringey and pasty. I can tell the author was " | " this close of drawing his idealized self onto this like any many other of these same type [western knight/royality, forest magical elfs and short furry people (who are clearly supposed to be the japs from their mannerisms, culture and vestments, like that no game no life furry kingdom) specializing in advanced tech/magitech and having to form a coalition against the "mao-no-ō" and its forces, armed with the plot powers of "muh dik"  which grants the female cast the "mana/magic points/spirit power" to conveniently pull off shit with no risks involved other then the precious heroines becoming nymphomaniacs bitches in perma heat for the mc by the end of the author's dream wish fulfillment show into the obvious haremorgy happily ever ending where everything just works out. ] of show. mc being a saber knock-off should've tipped me.
namonashi top tier as fuck
